chapters.title: Chapter 1:  The Flame of Tar Valon
chapters.info: Moiraine Damodred, p. 5—Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah who has dedicated her life to finding the Dragon Reborn. She came to the Two Rivers and found three young men who she thought may be the one she sought, and was correct. She is bonded to Lan and is an old friend of the Amyrlin Seat. Due to the nature of her life's work, she has not been back to the White Tower in a long time. See also Mandragoran, Lan; Sanche, Siuan.
